hero.label: Practical Interview Prep with KORFIT
hero.description: Practice with customized questions for each job role and receive detailed AI analysis to enhance your interview skills.

process.title: Interview Guide
items: Common, job-specific, and competency questions are presented randomly.
Enable the follow-up question feature for in-depth Q&A sessions.
Voice responses are automatically transcribed and recorded as text.
KORFIT analyzes 5 core competencies after all answers are completed.

examples.title: Sample Questions
items: Please give us a brief introduction of yourself.
Explain your strengths and weaknesses in relation to the job role.
What do you value most in Korean corporate culture?
Tell us about the goals you want to achieve within 3 years of joining.

items.title: Question Setup
items.content: Configure your interview by selecting the job role and difficulty level.

items.title: Conduct Interview
items.content: Answer questions via voice or text, just like a real interview.

items.title: AI Analysis
items.content: Analyze your competencies based on the content of your answers.

items.title: Detailed Feedback
items.content: Refine your skills through key improvement points and suggested answers.

items.title: Real-world Interview Flow
items.content: Structured with common, job-specific, and competency-based questions.

items.title: Competency-based Reports
items.content: Provides objective evaluations based on 5 core professional competencies.

items.title: Improvement via Notes
items.content: Track your growth by comparing current responses with previous records.

items.title: Systematic Training
items.content: Prepare effectively with step-by-step plans tailored to your goals.
